#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define limit (long long) 1e7
int isPrime[limit+1];
void precompute()
{
    long long i,j,f;
    memset(isPrime,0,sizeof(isPrime));
    isPrime[0]=-1;
    isPrime[1]=-1;
    f=0;
    for(i=2;i<=limit;i++)
        if(isPrime[i]==0)
            {
                isPrime[i]=++f;
                for(j=i*i;j<=limit;j+=i)
                    isPrime[j]=-1;
            }
}
int main()
{
    precompute();
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%d\n",isPrime[n]);
    }
}
